U-103 (). Decommissioned on 13 March 1944 at Memel and later used as training hulk at Gotenhafen. In January 1945 transferred to Hamburg-Finkenwerder and used as power generating plant. Transferred to Kiel in April 1945.

Scuttled on 3 May 1945 at Kiel. Wreck broken up.

U-579 (Oblt. Hans-Dietrich Schwarzenberg). Decommissioned on 12 October 1941 at Danzig after a fire in the forward torpedo compartment. Repaired in the Holmwerft at Danzig and returned to service on 27 May 1942.
